title: Ford Stock Loses a Bull Because the Outlook Appears ‘Bleak’
text:
Iconic U.S. auto maker Ford Motor reported third-quarter earnings on Wednesday, and the numbers were actually OK. But they still weren't good enough for Deutsche Bank to keep recommending the stock. Analyst Emmanuel Rosner downgraded shares to Hold from Buy and cut his price target to $11 from $12 a share.
